media:group.media:title: The Joy of Cooking (with Bugs!)
media:group.media:description:
Add some healthy, sustainable CRUNCH to your diet by incorporating more insects into your meals! Many are packed with nutrients, and are already enjoyed by billions around the world. Bon appétit!

Learn more about the Field Museum's partnership with Journeyman Distillery, in honor of the Museum's 125-year anniversary: https://www.journeymandistillery.com/field-rye 

And be sure to check out Joe Hanson's video over at It's Okay To Be Smart! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X-E6I6027DY
